chatbot.model

Class Chatbot

  • java.lang.Object
    • chatbot.model.Chatbot

  • public class Chatbot
extends java.lang.Object
    The Chatbot model class. Used for checking and manipulating Strings.
    Version:
    1.4 11/11/14 Update processText and added a checker
    Author:
    Rachel Goodliffe
